subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lee Westwood of England shot a four-under-par 68 to take a two-stroke lead after the third round of the South African Open Championship in Paarl. Westwood is at 14-under-par 202. Michael Lorenzo-Vera of France and Northern Ireland’s Gareth Maybin are tied for second.
